title: 86/255/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 May 1986 on the approval of the adaptation of the national framework programme concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 May 1986
on the approval of the adaptation of the national framework programme  concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(86/255/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The adaptation of the national framework programme forwarded by the Italian Government on 13 November 1985 concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 27.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
